verses.name: 2 Samuel 1:23
verses.text: Saul and Jonathan were lovely and pleasant in their lives, and in their death they were not divided: they were swifter than eagles, they were stronger than lions.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 1:24
verses.text: Ye daughters of Israel, weep over Saul, who clothed you in scarlet, with other delights, who put on ornaments of gold upon your apparel.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 1:25
verses.text: How are the mighty fallen in the midst of the battle! O Jonathan, thou wast slain in thine high places.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 1:26
verses.text: I am distressed for thee, my brother Jonathan: very pleasant hast thou been unto me: thy love to me was wonderful, passing the love of women.
